email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipment of 10,000MT Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lisa,

We are looking to ship 10,000MT of wheat from Houston to Rotterdam on CIF terms. Could you provide a quote and confirm vessel availability for a laycan of November 15-20?

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 10,000MT Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel SEA HORIZON, DWT 50,000, LOA 200m, currently available for your cargo. The rate is USD 45 per MT on CIF terms. Laycan is November 15-20 as requested. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 10,000MT Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lisa,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 45 seems a bit high given the current market. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 10,000MT Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Given the current market conditions, I can offer a reduced rate of USD 42 per MT. Demurrage is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata. Loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if you need any more details.

Best regards,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 10,000MT Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lisa,

USD 42 sounds better. Can we lock in the SEA HORIZON with a laycan of November 15-20? Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Lisa,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
John
